Uses of Package
android.net.wifi

Packages that use android.net.wifi
android.net.wifi Provides classes to manage Wi-Fi functionality on the device. 
 

Classes in android.net.wifi used by android.net.wifi
IWifiManager
          Interface that allows controlling and querying Wi-Fi connectivity.
ScanResult
          Describes information about a detected access point.
SupplicantState
          From defs.h in wpa_supplicant.
WifiConfiguration
          A class representing a configured Wi-Fi network, including the security configuration.
WifiInfo
          Describes the state of any Wifi connection that is active or is in the process of being set up.
WifiManager.WifiLock
          Allows an application to keep the Wi-Fi radio awake.
WifiStateTracker
          Track the state of Wifi connectivity.
